Alpha diversity correlation ----------------------------
Determine whether numeric sample metadata columns are correlated with alpha diversity.
Parameters ---------- alpha_diversity : SampleData[AlphaDiversity] Vector of alpha diversity values by sample. metadata : Metadata The sample metadata. method : Str % Choices({'pearson', 'spearman'}), optional The correlation test to be applied.
Returns ------- visualization : Visualization \
